text: Malla is a short version of Magdalena, and a separate given name. It may refer to *Malla Nunn, screenwriter and author from Swaziland *Malla Reddy, Indian politician *Magdalena Rudenschöld (1766–1823), Swedish conspirator *Malla Silfverstolpe (1782–1861), Swedish salon hostess
title: Malla (given name)
